title: SET_ROPES_CREATE_NETWORK_WORLD_STATE
content:
0xE62FC73// SetRopesCreateNetworkWorldState
void SET_ROPES_CREATE_NETWORK_WORLD_STATE(BOOL shouldCreate);Parameters:shouldCreate: Whether to create an underlying network world stateToggles whether the usage of ADD_ROPE should create an underlying CNetworkRopeWorldStateData. By default this is set to false.
